name: Soccer Uniform
description:
Get early access to build and test build, be able to try all epochs and test them by yourself on Patreon or contact me for support on Discord

To support me you can buy me a coffe at https://ko-fi.com/antonioriolo

Recommended settings:

  • Make sure you are aware on the usage instructions of LORA

  • Sampler: DPM++ SDE Karras (Recommended for best quality, you may try other samplers)

  • CFG Scale : 5 to 10

  • LORA weight for txt2img: reccomended 0.3-0.7. (I used 0.5)

  • Keys: wearing soccer_uniform, back view, inside soccer_field, kicking the ball

Very simple to use, just use the keywords, i advice to try with 1.3 weight in all keywords.

As i did in my generated images you can prompt somthing like "red outfit" to have a colored one, it's not necessary a weight on it usually.

As you can see while using "kicking the ball" keyword, anything can happen, you can get amazing images of soccer action, but you can also see balls coming from nowhere with wrong sizes sometime. Just wait for a lucky seed.

Works also with anime.

Enjoy!

If you'd like to support my efforts and have access to early and bleeding edge builds, please think about joining my Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/betterCuteAsians
